data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_60e3e11da30f404c77fff9e22d3bdc72.png

skilllist.skilldesc: Cici generates a stack of Delight after dealing damage, increasing her Movement Speed by 0.75% and Spell Vamp by 0.75% per stack up to 10 times, doubling the effects at full stacks.

Cici uses Yoyo to continuously attack the nearest enemy within range (prioritizing heroes) for 3.5s, hitting them up to 10 times, and dealing <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> equal to 70 plus 3<font color="fba51f"> (+1.2% Extra Physical Attack)</font>% of the target's Max HP per hit. Cici can move and use other skills during this attack.

If there is no enemy within range, Yoyo will attack Turrets or the Base instead.

This skill deals 20% extra damage to Minions.

Cici leaps to a target location. If she lands on any unit (not including Turrets and Base), she can leap again in the Joystick's direction. If she lands on an enemy with the first leap, she deals 200<font color="fba51f"> (+40% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to them.

Cici throws Yoyo at the target enemy hero and links them with another nearby enemy hero, dealing 100<font color="fba51f"> (+10% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>, slowing them by 30%, and pulling them together for 4s. 

During this time, Cici can use <font color="a6aafb">Yo-Yo Blitz</font> to attack both linked targets at the same time. If only one target is within the range of <font color="a6aafb">Yo-Yo Blitz</font>, Cici will attack the target twice, but the damage of the second attack will be reduced to 20%.

data.name: Cici

__data.skilldesc: Gain 50% extra Movement Speed and <font color="62f8fe">Slow Immunity</font> for 6s.
__data.skilldesc_text: Gain <%Num2> extra Movement Speed and [C2Slow Immunity] for <Num1>s.
__data.skilldescemblem: Gain 50% extra Movement Speed and <font color="62f8fe">Slow Immunity</font> for 6s.

recommendmasterplan.description: Exp Lane: High damage and mobility in teamfights.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+10% Spell Vamp
+22 Adaptive Attack
+6 Extra Physical Defense
+6 Extra Magic Defense

emblemskill.skilldesc: Gain 6% Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional 0.5% Spell Vamp, up to 8 stacks.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Gain <%Num1> Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional <%Num2> Spell Vamp, up to <Num3> stacks.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Gain 6% Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional 0.5% Spell Vamp, up to 8 stacks.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing skill damage to an enemy hero recovers 5% of Max HP.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 6s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing skill damage to an enemy hero recovers <%Num1> of Max HP.########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num2>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing skill damage to an enemy hero recovers 5% of Max HP.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 6s</font>.

equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Movement Speed
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1:
Fighting Spirit: Attacks grant 12 extra Physical Attack per second for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Deals extra 10% True Damage based on the damage dealt (no damage reduction counted) at full stacks.
<font color="A4AAC7">Marksmen, Mages, and Supports only receive 50% of these stacked effects</font>.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Fighting Spirit: Attacks grant 12 extra Physical Attack per second for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Deals extra 10% True Damage based on the damage dealt (no damage reduction counted) at full stacks.
<font color="A4AAC7">Marksmen, Mages, and Supports only receive 50% of these stacked effects</font>.
equiplist.equiptips:
+35 Extra Physical Attack
+400 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+12% Spell Vamp

equiplist.equipskill1: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equiptips:
+15Physical Penetration
+80 Extra Physical Attack
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Brute Force: Each second after dealing damage, gain 6 extra Adaptive Attack and 2% extra Movement Speed for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Gain 15% extra Control Duration Reduction at full stacks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Brute Force: Each second after dealing damage, gain 6 extra Adaptive Attack and 2% extra Movement Speed for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Gain 15% extra Control Duration Reduction at full stacks.
equiplist.equiptips:
+600 Extra Max HP
+23 Extra Physical Defense
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equiptips:
+900 Extra Max HP
+48 Extra Magic Defense
+2 HP Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
equiplist.equipskill2: Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.
equiplist.equiptips: +60 Extra Physical Attack

recommendmasterplan.name: BF - Marbon
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: A cheerful performer who spreads fun and wonderment wherever she goes.

assist.desc: Cici works well with heroes that have buffs and can boost survivability. Supports like Angela and Floryn can help Cici gain an early advantage by greatly amplifying her combat capabilities to end the game before it drags on too long.

strong.desc: Because of Cici's great kiting ability and her 1st Skill dealing Max HP damage, Cici counters certain Tanks like Fredrinn and Minotaur.

weak.desc: Cici is countered by heroes with targeted CC skills who can stop her dead in her tracks, such as Saber and Kaja.
